title: Cafe at 407
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Cafe was founded to help fund a non-profit organization that provides outreach, advocacy and education for people who suffer from eating disorders. Offers organic and locally sourced food as well as locally roasted coffee. Has a limited menu that includes a few vegan choices, including a veggie sandwich, hummus, salads and oatmeal, with sometimes a vegan soup of the day. Accommodating to modifications to menu items.
